g2.note: G2 scraping requires Selenium + anti-bot bypass

basic_info.note: Full job scraping not implemented - placeholder

key_trends: Demand for unified data access layers

competitive_positioning.competitive_moat: Strong open-source community and established market leadership in GraphQL technologies.
competitive_positioning.differentiation: Leader in GraphQL client, server, and gateway technologies with a large open-source community.
competitive_vulnerabilities: Potential disruption from newer GraphQL implementations

growth_bottlenecks: Competition in the API management space

key_risks: Difficulty in converting open-source users to paying customers

strengths: Market leader in a growing market
concerns: Competition from other API management solutions

next_steps: Continue to invest in open-source community
Expand enterprise sales and marketing efforts
expansion_opportunities: Develop new GraphQL-related tools and services
Integrate with other API management platforms
